import React from 'react'; import { UserIcon, AreaIcon, HomeIcon } from "../../assets/icons"; import "./HeroInfoCard.scss"; const HeroInfoCard = ({ title, population, area, price }) => { return (
Population:
{population}
Territory:
{area}
AVG Price:
{price}
Explore More
) } export default HeroInfoCard;
